transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Haan ji sir.
Customer: Uh, ma'am, good morning. Meri baat Krishna Power Solutions se ho rahi hai?
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji. Ankita baat kar rahi hu mai. Good morning sir.
Customer: Ankita ma'am, good morning.
Customer: Ma'am, actually me na abhi shayad Paras sir ka call aaya tha IndiaMART pe but shayad galti se aa gaya tha. Khair unhone to bola ki galti se lag gayi hai. But uska koi problem nahi hai. Chalo uska to feedback close kar denge. Wo actually me customer care pe unhone galti se call kar diya tha. But mera ek question tha ma'am. Kuch products the aapke jaise offline UPS, Amaron ka automotive battery, in fan battery. To un sab ko kya aapne out of stock kar rakha hai aap logo ne? Abhi isme work nahi kar rahe hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi, aisa to kuch nahi hai. Sab me matlab aapko aisa to kuch bola bhi nahi hoga kyuki aisa kuch hai nahi.
Customer: Nahi nahi, suniye to. Wo out of stock me hi hai. Aap chahe to ek baar check kar sakte ho seller panel open karke apna.
Executive: Achha, theek hai. Mai check karti hu ek baar ki aisa kyu dikha raha hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan, ek baar ye aap check kar lijiyega. Theek hai? Aur overall to aisa hai ki abhi waise ye bhi jaanna tha ki abhi overall services aapki chal kaise rahi hai IndiaMART ke through? Business aa pa raha hai, nahi aa pa raha hai?
Executive: Haan, matlab theek hai sir.
Customer: Achha, theek hai. Okay, matlab mediocre hai na? Kuch bahut achha bhi nahi kahunga aur bahut kharab bhi nahi kahunga.
Executive: Bahut bura, haan ji.
Customer: Haan. To abhi ek product hai ma'am, cold water dispenser. Theek hai? Iski aap lead consume kar rahe ho. To aap agar chaho to is product ko add kar lo. Hai na? Cold water, cold water dispenser. Theek hai? Ek kaam aap ye kar loge. Theek hai? Ek issue ma'am ye hai ki jab aapki website koi buyer open karta hai, theek hai ma'am IndiaMART pe, to usme call ka jo response rate hai wo 53% aata hai. Ye hota hai 90 days ka average ki 90 dino me kitni calls aayi aur aap kitni receive kar paaye. To wo 53% hai. To wo kaafi jyada low ho gayi hai. To isme ek baar dhyaan dijiyega ki kaise aap kya kar sakte ho. Yaha pe mai agar batau to aapke numbers jo hai IndiaMART pe do added hai. Ek to aapka, ek sir ka.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Theek hai? To isko aapko ek baar rectify karne ki jarurat hai. Lead manager ka usage ma'am IndiaMART pe aap log kaafi kam kar rahe ho. I think aap log follow karte honge call ya WhatsApp ya mail karke. But jo hamara lead manager hai na jaha pe sara data save hota hai aapka. Jaise waha se bhi ma'am aap reply kar diya karo. Pata hai iska ek benefit hai ki aap jis city ke buyer ko reply kar rahe ho aur jis product ke buyer ko reply kar rahe ho, hai na? Jis product ke liye.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji, haan.
Customer: Un dono me hi aapka jo hai visibility increase hoti hai. City plus us product me. To iska jo result hai aapko within six-seven days me hi nazar aane lagega ki aapka call aur enquiry ka flow aur achha ho jayega IndiaMART pe. Theek hai? Ye tha ek aapka pointer. Aur ek tha aapka ki rating and reviews pe ma'am thoda sa dhyaan dena padega. Abhi kya hai ki koi bhi buyer aata hai aapke products ko lene ke liye na to abhi koi product lena ja rahe ho kisi site pe to thoda rating and review ko dekhte hai. To abhi overall aapka 3.6 out of five hai. Aur in totality 45 buyers ne aapko review diya hai IndiaMART pe. Theek hai? Aur ek cheez aur thi ye jo lead abhi aati hai ma'am isme kya kuch aisa bhi rehta hai ki lead aapke products se related nahi aati hai? Matlab irrelevant mai kahunga. Aisa kuch rehta hai?
Executive: Nahi, abhi to aisa hua nahi hai. Abhi theek-theek hai. Lead unhi ki aani chahiye jo buy karte hai.
Customer: Jo hamare products hai.
Executive: Achha aur?
Customer: Samajh gaya. Aur isme ek cheez aur jaanni thi ma'am ki retail ka bhi kuch rehta hai kya? Jaise agar ek-do product ki lead aa rahi hai to usme aap deal kar sakte hai ya nahi kar sakte hai?
Executive: Haan sir, karte hai. Kabhi agar matlab hota hai to ek-do products ki usme bhi hum deal kar lete hai.
Customer: Achha, achha, theek hai. Ek lead mujhe achhi to dikh rahi hai waise to Microtek UPS offline karke hai. Diwara nazdiki 1800 pieces ki. Order value to unhone bahut bada dala. I don't know member bhi 7 saal se jyada ke hai. But mai iske [unintelligible] aapke kaam ki hogi ki nahi. 1800 pieces, 1800 pieces kabhi kisi ne liya hai waise? Kitna maximum kitne products matlab quantity me chala jata hai ma'am products?
Executive: Sir, depend karta hai. Jaise sir 1800 to bahut jyada hai.
Customer: Jyada hai. Isiliye to mai abhi kah raha hu.
Executive: Jyada hai, haan. Kyuki ek dam se 1800 to shayad hi koi lega ya matlab shop bhi jo open karta hoga wo bhi nahi lega.
Customer: Haan, haan, haan. Haan ji. Theek hai. Overall to aap log kaafi achha kar rahe ho. Maine dekha hai ki jo buylead ka consumption bahut achha hai. Theek hai? Idhar call seeing rate idhar to aapne theek kari hai. Bas ye ki jab teen mahine ka average nikalta hai to gadbad aa jata hai. 30 days me to 60% hai. But koshish hame ye karna hai ki at least 80% plus ho. Kyuki jab buyer aapke page pe aata hai na Krishna Power Solutions ko to upar hi dikhta hai ki yaar ye supplier to response jyada deta hi nahi hai. Samajh rahe ho baat? Waha 53% response rate. Haan. Aur rating bhi hame kyuki bhai ek chhota sa bhi earphone bhi hame lena hota hai to hum Amazon Flipkart pe jaake review dekhte hai ki kaisa product raha. Hai na? After usage ka hi jyadatar aata hai wo review. To mai to ye kahunga ki aap apni rating ko achha karne ke liye jin buyer ne pehle product liye hai, hai na? Jin buyer ne pehle product liye hai, unse aap koshish karo review lene ka. Ask for review ka option aapke lead manager me aata hai. To usse kya hoga jo purani rating se aur apni nayi rating me na kya hoga average hone lagega to ho sakta hai 4 point plus ho jaye to jyada better rahega. Matlab jo buyer ko dikhne me achha bhi lagega aur aapke liye bhi kaafi beneficial rahega. Theek hai? Waise to ma'am abhi na ek na mai waise to close karunga. Sir ka ek feedback aaya tha unhone bola kyuki mujhe koi aisa issue to nahi maine galti se laga diya tha. But unse baat nahi ho pa rahi thi to maine socha secondary number pe ek baar call kar lu. Haan. Unhone closure to de diya tha Muskan ko. Haan ji. Haan, aap feedback un satisfied kar dena agar aapke paas aati hai mail to, hai na?
Executive: Haan, sure sir. Okay. Thank you ma'am. Have a nice day.
Executive: Thank you. Thank you sir. Have a nice day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Offline UPS products showing out of stock.

- Call response rate is low (53%).

- Lead manager usage is low.

- Rating and reviews need improvement (3.6/5).



Resolution:

- Executive will check why products are out of stock.

- Advised to rectify the two numbers on IndiaMART.

- Advised to use lead manager for replying.

- Advised to improve rating by asking for reviews.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on secondary number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- out of stock, lead manager, rating, reviews, buyleads
